api.adapter.mano.cisconfv module¶

class api.adapter.mano.cisconfv.CiscoNFVManoAdapter(nso_hostname, nso_username, nso_password, esc_hostname, esc_username, esc_password, nso_port=2022, esc_port=830)[source]¶
